title: Upgraded Apartment Homes, Swimming Pool, Picnic Area & BBQ
posting_body: ['Huntington House’s plush, landscaped courtyards with two community pools, walking paths, sundecks, barbecues and picnic tables welcomes residents with the perfect environment to call “home”.', 'Each apartment offers spacious floor plans, beautiful views of the courtyards and private entry.', 'Located on Fort Street enjoy Huntington House’s neighborhood charm in the city.', 'We would love for you to come on by and see what Huntington House has to offer!', '-Laundry Facility', '-BBQ & Picnic Area', '-Online Payment Options (Credit Card, Debit Card and ACH)', '-Radiant Baseboard Heat', '-Picture Windows with Courtyard Views', '-Air Conditioned', '-No Security Deposit Required', '-Late Fee Forgiveness', '-Package Acceptance', '-Sparkling Clean Swimming Pool', '-One $35 Application Fee Per Apartment, Not Per Person', '-Private Entrance', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
